commands.name: az repos pr checkout
commands.summary: Checkout the PR source branch locally, if no local changes are present.

commands.name: az repos pr create
commands.syntax:
az repos pr create [--auto-complete {false, true}]
                   [--bypass-policy {false, true}]
                   [--bypass-policy-reason]
                   [--delete-source-branch {false, true}]
                   [--description]
                   [--detect {false, true}]
                   [--draft {false, true}]
                   [--labels]
                   [--merge-commit-message]
                   [--open]
                   [--optional-reviewers]
                   [--org]
                   [--project]
                   [--repository]
                   [--required-reviewers]
                   [--source-branch]
                   [--squash {false, true}]
                   [--target-branch]
                   [--title]
                   [--transition-work-items {false, true}]
                   [--work-items]

commands.name: az repos pr list
commands.syntax:
az repos pr list [--creator]
                 [--detect {false, true}]
                 [--include-links]
                 [--org]
                 [--project]
                 [--repository]
                 [--reviewer]
                 [--skip]
                 [--source-branch]
                 [--status {abandoned, active, all, completed}]
                 [--target-branch]
                 [--top]

commands.name: az repos pr set-vote
commands.syntax:
az repos pr set-vote --id
                     --vote {approve, approve-with-suggestions, reject, reset, wait-for-author}
                     [--detect {false, true}]
                     [--org]

commands.name: az repos pr show
commands.summary: Get the details of a pull request.

commands.name: az repos pr update
commands.syntax:
az repos pr update --id
                   [--auto-complete {false, true}]
                   [--bypass-policy {false, true}]
                   [--bypass-policy-reason]
                   [--delete-source-branch {false, true}]
                   [--description]
                   [--detect {false, true}]
                   [--draft {false, true}]
                   [--merge-commit-message]
                   [--org]
                   [--squash {false, true}]
                   [--status {abandoned, active, completed}]
                   [--title]
                   [--transition-work-items {false, true}]
